edge_1: When the gardener tries to poison the Bodhi Tree with DDT, Jack gets high on the fumes, and when the gardener tries to water it, Jack starts to sweat and perspire profusely.
edge_2: When squirrels climb the Bodhi Tree, it tickles Jack.

edge_1: When the gardener tries to poison the Bodhi Tree with DDT, Jack gets high on the fumes, and when the gardener tries to water it, Jack starts to sweat and perspire profusely.
edge_2: Aaron's smaller office has a Bodhi Tree, which is implied to be a prank since no leaves are shown falling off as Aaron speaks

edge_1: Jack promotes Aaron to his old position, and Aaron helps Jack with making a deal for his book
edge_2: Aaron calls Jack on his cell phone and tells him the tree's leaves have magically reappeared, so he can now talk freely again.

edge_1: Jack and Caroline get back together
edge_2: Caroline asks for a family-friendly house, which Jack and Caroline buy with the bodhi tree in their front yard
